meanings.definition: A tropical fruit with green skin and white, fibrous flesh.
meanings.sent1: I tried a soursop for the first time and loved its unique taste.
meanings.sent2: The market had fresh soursops on sale this week.
meanings.sent3: The soursop made a funny squishy sound when I squeezed it.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as refreshing as a soursop on a hot day.
meanings.sent5: The soursop's aroma filled the room, making everyone curious to taste it.

meanings.definition: The tree that produces the soursop fruit.
meanings.sent1: The soursop tree in our backyard provides us with delicious fruits every year.
meanings.sent2: The leaves of the soursop tree rustled in the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent3: I imagined the soursop tree wearing a crown of fruits like a king.
meanings.sent4: The branches of the soursop tree reached out as if offering its fruits to us.
meanings.sent5: The soursop tree stood tall and proud, bearing the fruits of its labor.
